title: New Sage Titanium Storm King GP gravel bike springs up w/ suspension-ready geometry
content:
Built off their original Storm King “Monster Gravel” bike, the new Storm King GP gets suspension corrected geometry tailor-made for running the new Rockshox Rudy gravel fork. Add in the rest of that new SRAM XPLR package, including the 1x SRAM drivetrain and Zipp Moto XPLR wheels, and they’ll calling it the bike to take

The post New Sage Titanium Storm King GP gravel bike springs up w/ suspension-ready geometry appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
